title: How Investors Will Be Using AI in 2026
description: Jannick Malling, Co-Founder & Co-CEO of Public.com, joins Vonnie Quinn and Norah Mulinda to discuss how retail investors are using AI, the kind of crypto growth to expect this year on the platform, and to give his macro outlook for the year. He speaks on "Bloomberg Markets." (Source: Bloomberg)

title: Wall Street Shifts Focus to AI as Key Growth Driver
description: By now every firm on Wall Street is well aware of the risks surrounding the artificial intelligence boom. But when it comes to the year ahead, few advocate walking away from what they describe as a “revolutionary” technology. Sam Potter has more. (Source: Bloomberg)

title: Grok Sexual Images Draw Rebuke, France Flags Content as Illegal
description: Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence chatbot Grok has created sexualized images of people including minors on the social media platform X in response to user prompts in recent days, drawing rebuke from officials such as the French government.
